text: continue for months or years.    - Some cancer treatments cause side effects months or years after treatment has ended.     - Four types of treatment are used:         - Radiation therapy     - Chemotherapy     - Surgery     - High-dose chemotherapy with stem cell rescue        - New types of treatment are being tested in clinical trials.    - Patients may want to think about taking part in a clinical trial.    - Patients can enter clinical trials before, during, or after starting their cancer
